articles.description: Two allergic reactions were reported on the first day of the rollout of the Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine, the head of Britain's medicine regulator said on Wednesday.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
LONDON, Dec 9 (Reuters) - Two allergic reactions were reported on the first day of the rollout of the Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine, the head of Britains medicine regulator said on Wednes… [+518 chars]

articles.title: Here’s what NC’s new modified stay-at-home order means for you - WSOC Charlotte
